track.name: Invitation to the Blues
comments: I must have listened to this song a hundred times, tonight..

Got a crazy sensation, go or stay? now I gotta choose,
And I'll accept your invitation to the blues
@hamboman THANKS! Haha, ik heb daar echt héél lang over nagedacht. Bedankt voor het verlossende antwoord!
oh dear... Tom can sing how he wants to sing. Cartoonish? What does that even mean? This is heartfelt, soulfull and beautiful. What a fucking tune.
what waits stuff do people think is most similar to this brilliant song?
Wasn't it used in a series or film or something like that?
Gooooood, could someone please tell me why the intro sounds so familiar?
and yes, good lyrics as well
love his raspy voice against the smooth sounds of piano and strokes
AHHHHH I LOVE THIS. THIS IS ME BEING ENTHUSIASTIC VIA CAPS LOCKS.
verry cartoonish, this. except not fun
